医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调年龄如何影响鼻细胞对 SARS-CoV-2 的反应研究人员揭示了鼻上皮细胞对 SARS-CoV-2 的反应与年龄相关的差异，显示了儿童、成人和老年人群体的细胞类型和病毒动力学的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-highlights-how-age-affects-nasal-cell-response-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-highlights-how-age-affects-nasal-cell-response-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17276e96-6d66-41cd-b7ed-3d31e7e02d01 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 22:04:00 -0400 Study highlights how age affects nasal cell response to SARS-CoV-2
研究发现低升糖指数和高升糖指数饮食比低碳水化合物饮食更能提高耐力表现发表在《运动医学 – 开放》上的一项研究评估了碳水化合物摄入量和血糖指数如何影响耐力训练结果，显示对代谢灵活性和糖原储存的显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-finds-low-and-high-GI-diets-boost-endurance-performance-over-low-carb-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-finds-low-and-high-GI-diets-boost-endurance-performance-over-low-carb-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b67a566-eb1a-4a53-a358-ae08132d083b Tue, 16 Apr 2024 19:09:00 -0400 Study finds low and high GI diets boost endurance performance over low-carb diets
用益生菌和合生元治疗糖尿病《临床营养学》的系统综述分析了随机试验，以评估益生元和合生元对糖尿病血糖控制的影响，揭示了空腹血糖、血清胰岛素和 HbA1C 水平的显着益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Managing-diabetes-with-probiotics-and-synbiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Managing-diabetes-with-probiotics-and-synbiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e98cf21-6f55-4fbd-8507-69398df1ee32 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 18:57:00 -0400 Managing diabetes with probiotics and synbiotics
青少年的垃圾食品饮食可能会长期扰乱大脑的记忆能力南加州大学领导的一项新研究提出了一种可能性，即青少年吃垃圾食品可能会长期破坏他们大脑的记忆能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Junk-food-filled-diet-in-teens-may-disrupt-brains-memory-ability-for-a-long-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Junk-food-filled-diet-in-teens-may-disrupt-brains-memory-ability-for-a-long-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2470fc40-bcba-42e5-843c-7fac88d51410 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 16:19:59 -0400 Junk food-filled diet in teens may disrupt brains' memory ability for a long time
探索基因变异如何影响严重癫痫儿童的脑细胞癫痫是一种导致反复发作的脑部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Exploring-how-gene-variants-affect-brain-cells-in-children-with-severe-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Exploring-how-gene-variants-affect-brain-cells-in-children-with-severe-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0c0af6c-98c6-40b0-84d1-b36580e7c0df Tue, 16 Apr 2024 16:14:11 -0400 Exploring how gene variants affect brain cells in children with severe epilepsy
FDA 宣布召回与死亡和受伤有关的心脏泵FDA 周一宣布，一对与数百人受伤和至少 14 人死亡有关的心脏装置已受到 FDA 最严重的召回。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/FDA-announces-recall-of-heart-pumps-linked-to-deaths-and-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/FDA-announces-recall-of-heart-pumps-linked-to-deaths-and-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3b1c5f7-b0b9-406d-84f5-5c9cb38beb50 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 16:09:53 -0400 FDA announces recall of heart pumps linked to deaths and injuries
研究揭示了促进癌细胞有效摄取 ASO 的新方法反义寡核苷酸 (ASO) 是下一代药物，可以通过阻止基因中有害信息的传递来治疗疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-reveals-novel-approach-to-promote-efficient-uptake-of-ASOs-into-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-reveals-novel-approach-to-promote-efficient-uptake-of-ASOs-into-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77f08a22-f700-4beb-aef5-7c11875ecf1b Tue, 16 Apr 2024 13:18:41 -0400 Study reveals novel approach to promote efficient uptake of ASOs into cancer cells
胎盘 IGFBP1：妊娠期糖尿病发生的关键因素哈佛 Pilgrim 医疗保健研究所领导的一项新研究发现，胎盘基因胰岛素样生长因子 1 (IGFBP1) 表达缺陷和 IGFBP1 循环水平低与妊娠期胰岛素抵抗有关，这凸显了潜在的风险因素妊娠糖尿病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Placental-IGFBP1-A-key-factor-in-development-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Placental-IGFBP1-A-key-factor-in-development-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=992c7274-104c-4cbf-93f4-30d44bd6f6ab Tue, 16 Apr 2024 09:17:00 -0400 Placental IGFBP1: A key factor in development of gestational diabetes
皮特大学的研究人员揭示了葡萄膜黑色素瘤耐药性背后的机制匹兹堡大学的新研究解释了为什么转移性葡萄膜黑色素瘤对传统免疫疗法有抵抗力，以及过继疗法（包括在将患者的 T 细胞回输之前在体外培养）如何成功治疗这种罕见的侵袭性癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Pitt-researchers-uncover-mechanisms-behind-uveal-melanoma-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Pitt-researchers-uncover-mechanisms-behind-uveal-melanoma-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd4bfbd2-af84-4267-9f77-b5302e6f16f5 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 09:05:00 -0400 Pitt researchers uncover mechanisms behind uveal melanoma resistance
研究表明“家庭”纽带在疗养院中的重要性新研究发现，当养老院居民与员工享有“家庭”联系时，他们会得到更好的护理，但必须赋予员工建立这些联系的权力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Research-shows-the-importance-of-family-bonds-in-care-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Research-shows-the-importance-of-family-bonds-in-care-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25c3fbb3-127f-4a89-9a7a-101ee1344fec Tue, 16 Apr 2024 08:56:00 -0400 Research shows the importance of 'family' bonds in care homes
